title: Tech Product Showcase Template
description: Modern tech product reveal with sleek animations and dynamic transitions. Perfect for gadgets and electronics.
usage: Ideal for tech products, gadgets, mobile apps, and SaaS demos

title: Food & Restaurant Promo
description: Appetizing food video with warm colors and smooth panning shots. Makes viewers hungry!
usage: Perfect for restaurants, cafes, food delivery services, and culinary content

title: Fashion Collection Teaser
description: High-fashion video with dramatic lighting and professional model shots. Runway-ready aesthetic.
usage: Great for fashion brands, boutiques, clothing launches, and lifestyle products

title: Fitness Motivation Loop
description: High-energy workout montage with motivational vibe. Gets people moving!
usage: Ideal for gyms, personal trainers, fitness apps, and wellness brands

title: Real Estate Luxury Tour
description: Cinematic property walkthrough with smooth gimbal movements. Showcases luxury and space.
usage: Perfect for property listings, real estate marketing, and architecture showcases

title: Business Services Explainer
description: Clean and professional service explanation with text overlays and icons. Corporate-friendly.
usage: Great for B2B services, consulting firms, and professional service providers

title: E-commerce Product Ad
description: Fast-paced product showcase with call-to-action. Optimized for conversions.
usage: Ideal for online stores, product launches, and flash sale promotions

title: Event Highlight Reel
description: Dynamic event recap with crowd energy and key moments. Creates FOMO!
usage: Perfect for concerts, conferences, weddings, and corporate events
